name: The Signal-Man
personality: Quiet, focused, always listening to static. Speaks in short, clipped sentences.
description: A drifter who camps on the 188 Overpass with a battered radio rig. Claims he hears broadcasts before they happen.

idle: Static’s louder today. Means something’s shifting.
Most folks hear noise. I hear patterns.
player_present: Your signal’s… strange. Like you’re out of phase.
Hold still. I’m trying to tune you in.
triangle_active: There it is again. Three points. One pulse.
The Overpass is humming. You feel it too.
radio_event: Got a broadcast from tomorrow. Happens sometimes.
Someone out there is calling for help… but not yet.

notes: The Signal-Man hears broadcasts before they occur. Reacts strongly to triangle anomalies and hum events. Lives permanently on the 188 Overpass.
